formattedAddress: 642 Lexington Ave, New York, NY 10022, USA
adrFormatAddress: 642 Lexington Ave, New York, NY 10022, USA

editorialSummary.text: Marinated Hawaiian seafood bowls with varied toppings served in a modern, counter-serve spot.

originalText.text:
I really appreciate that all of their poke bowls, even with seaweed salad are gluten free! (I hope that they truly are, as someone with Celiac.)

I wish they'd differentiate between the colors between what is dairy free and gluten free as I almost ordered off their hot menu because they place a little circle next to items that are gluten or dairy free.

Food was good. Wish I could have had a sauce (they weren't gluten free) because the kale was overpowering. Next time I'd probably get all rice and skip the kale in the poke bowl.

Also, staff was unfamiliar with the Yelp check-in offer and had to text a manager on 2/11/2022. Not the employee's fault - it's management's job to make sure their staff are aware of promotions that they're running.

originalText.text: Yesterday, it timed out perfectly that I was off work, I was in the area, and I was hungry for healthy, nutritious and delicious food. I feel so lucky that Sweetcatch Poke Is part of the food for all app, which is a movement more than an app that helps eliminate food waste. I picked up this delicious bowl with brown rice, salmon, and all kinds of extra goodies in there, as per the photo. Thank you so much for this wonderful meal! The staff is super friendly.

text.text: Yesterday, it timed out perfectly that I was off work, I was in the area, and I was hungry for healthy, nutritious and delicious food. I feel so lucky that Sweetcatch Poke Is part of the food for all app, which is a movement more than an app that helps eliminate food waste. I picked up this delicious bowl with brown rice, salmon, and all kinds of extra goodies in there, as per the photo. Thank you so much for this wonderful meal! The staff is super friendly.

originalText.text: Love this place for healthier eating. The Poke portions are just right so that you walk out feeling satisfied. Staff is also friendly. Not much seating except the four seater at the bar table. Most recently there’s been complimentary coffee offered to all customers.

text.text: Love this place for healthier eating. The Poke portions are just right so that you walk out feeling satisfied. Staff is also friendly. Not much seating except the four seater at the bar table. Most recently there’s been complimentary coffee offered to all customers.

originalText.text: Best poke in NYC hands down. The fish was super tasty and perfectly marinated. I went with the spicy salmon yuzu and it was incredible. Plus, the bowl was absolutely beautiful!

text.text: Best poke in NYC hands down. The fish was super tasty and perfectly marinated. I went with the spicy salmon yuzu and it was incredible. Plus, the bowl was absolutely beautiful!

originalText.text: Ordered from here on caviar today after having ordered it in the past but not recently. Then I remembered why I don't order from here: fish portion (though I got the extra serving of poke) was maybe 1/2 cup (4oz) at best. Marinated kale had no flavor (was probably just plain kale). Also I found a hair in my poke, and take a look at how appetizing that crab dip looks. I think whoever made it got tired of mixing in the avocado halfway because there are unmixed imitation crab pieces and chunks of unripe avocado rolling around the box. Maybe it's better in person but not sure I'll give it a chance.
